```{r}
head(pea_data)
taps = pea_data

for(i in nrow(pea_data):1) {
    if(pea_data[i,3] != "Tap") {
        taps = taps[-i,] 
    }

head(taps)
```

```{r}

plot(lats$Trmt, lats$Abs_Mass, main = "lateral roots")
```


